actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the withdrawal and release of certain records and documents created or obtained by and in the possession of the Special Committee on Aging to the Office of Disciplinary Counsel, Supreme Court State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Authorizes the Chairman of the Special Committee on Aging to release certain records and documents created or obtained by and in the possession of the Committee to the Office of Disciplinary Counsel, Supreme Court, State of Hawaii.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the withdrawal and release of certain records and documents created or obtained by and in the possession of the Special Committee on Aging to the Office of Disciplinary Counsel, Supreme Court State of Hawaii.
